name: incipience
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the beginning of something: This find could provide evidence about the incipience of human language. The game has lost none of its charm over the decade or more since its incipience.
More examplesFewer examplesThis would allow us to examine the process of sociolinguistic change from incipience to completion.From what point should one date the clinical incipience of tuberculosis?The sign language Kata Kolok emerged five generations ago and has been in close contact with spoken Balinese from its incipience.
